title: 解决背包编辑器BUG
author: kiss_sky
txt_content: 打开后台找到config文件夹里customNpc、把opsonly=false改成opsonly=true

replies.author: kiss_sky
replies.txt_content:

你这是有多闲
不闲啊~~
